data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Copyright licenses grant permission to do something. A ____ license ____ a ____ not ____ do ____ things, under ____ conditions. Exclusive ____ policies ____ certain ____ provide ____ certain ____ which ____ not ____ any ____, ____ as ____ of ____ amounts ____ texts, sometimes ____ fair ____. Many countries' legal systems afford compulsory licenses for particular activities, especially in the area of patent law.
data.partBlankContent: Copyright licenses grant permission to do something. A pat___ license i_ a decla______ not t_ do so__ things, under cer____ conditions. Exclusive rig___ policies i_ certain coun_____ provide f__ certain activ_____ which d_ not req____ any lic____, su__ as reprod______ of sm___ amounts o_ texts, sometimes ter___ fair u__. Many countries' legal systems afford compulsory licenses for particular activities, especially in the area of patent law.
data.answer: 版权许可授予做某事的允许权。专利许可是在某些条件下不做某些事情的声明。某些国家的专有权政策规定，某些活动不需要任何许可，如复制少量的文本，有时被称为合理使用。许多国家的法律制度为特定活动提供强制许可，特别是在专利法领域。
